# EnumHelper.CreateEnumTypeFromDescriptionAttribute&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a Enum whose description matches the indicated value.

```csharp
public static Enum CreateEnumTypeFromDescriptionAttribute<T>(string descriptionEnum)
    where T : struct
```

## Return Value

A Enum whose description matches the indicated value.
